title: Calories in a Russet Potato
meta_description: Learn calories in russet potato for a medium size, plus carbs, protein, fiber, fat, and full nutrition facts to track your intake easily.
assumptions: Medium russet potato (173 g), baked with skin, no added salt, oil, or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, variety, cooking method, and soil conditions. Check labels or databases for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A medium baked russet potato provides ~168 kcal and ~4.6 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one russet potato?
faqs.a: About 168 kcal for a medium baked russet potato with skin.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a russet potato?
faqs.a: A medium one has ~39 g carbs, including 3.4 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a russet potato low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.2 g total fat per medium potato, with 0 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in russet potato?
faqs.a: Baking retains more nutrients; frying or adding fats increases calories significantly.

faqs.q: What's the protein in russet potato?
faqs.a: Around 4.6 g protein per medium russet potato.
